context_bundle.summary: Correlation ID pattern for tracking request/response pairs and distributed transactions across multiple agents using UUIDs

onboarding.quick_start: Generate UUID for each request, include in message metadata, responder echoes in correlationId field, requester matches responses
common_patterns: Request: Generate UUID, include as 'id' field in message
Matching: Requester polls for response with matching correlationId
Nested requests: Child requests include parent correlationId for tracing
Logging: Include correlation ID in all log entries for distributed tracing
